meanings: (어떤 장소에) be; (건물 등이) stand, be located (in/at), be situated; (도시 등이) lie
(시설·장치 등이) have; (시설이) be equipped with, be provided with

vlive.korean: 이렇게 하고 있겠다고? You will be doing like this? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 에이티즈와 함께 하는 초성게임🙆‍♂️
vlive.english: You will be doing like this?

vlive.korean: 다른 발표 하는 동안 이걸 쓰고 있겠다고? You will be wearing this while there are other presentations? 듣기 View video Hyomstore : ep.14 후반기 제품 검증 START! (feat. 유신월, 안리안나,메이찬)
vlive.english: You will be wearing this while there are other presentations?

vlive.korean: 댓길을 읽고 있을게요 - 댓길을 읽고 있겠다고요? I'll be reading the comments. (*Sounds like "that way") - You'll be reading the that way? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈&휴닝카이 : 뚝딱뚝딱 공작시간
vlive.english: I'll be reading the comments. (*Sounds like "that way") - You'll be reading the that way?

vlive.korean: [긍정적] 이거 30분이면 할 수 있겠다 고! [Positive] We can do it in 30 minutes, go! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.2
vlive.english: [Positive] We can do it in 30 minutes, go!

vlive.korean: 그래서 제가 제일 밑에 있겠다고 했어요. I volunteered to be at the bottom. 듣기 View video Wanna One : 관린이 심심하다😎
vlive.english: I volunteered to be at the bottom.

examples.korean: I promise I’ll be there for you 발음듣기 약속해요, 그대 곁에 있겠다고. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I promise I’ll be there for you 발음

examples.korean: Please tell him that I'll be expecting his call. 발음듣기 전화 기다리고 있겠다고 그에게 전해 주십시오. Neungyule
examples.english: Please tell him that I'll be expecting his call. 발음

examples.korean: Could you just say I've run into an old friend and I am going to stay out a bit with him? 발음듣기 옛 친구를 우연히 만나서 잠깐 같이 있겠다고만 전해주시겠어요? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Could you just say I've run into an old friend and I am going to stay out a bit with him? 발음

examples.korean: I made a promise to stay there until he came. 발음듣기 나는 그가 올 때까지 거기 있겠다고 약속했다. Neungyule
examples.english: I made a promise to stay there until he came. 발음

examples.korean: It’s pretty hectic having to fight all that holiday traffic just to get out of town for a couple of days. 발음듣기 겨우 며칠 도시를 떠나 있겠다고 연휴 교통 체증에 시달려야 한다는 건 정말 피곤한 일이거든요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s pretty hectic having to fight all that holiday traffic just to get out of town for a couple of days. 발음
